entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as someone who might spare a person.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character with authority and contempt for Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character who seems to shrink under Dumbledore's contempt.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as someone who has never heard so much contempt in Dumbledore's voice.

entities.name: the mother
entities.description: A person whose husband and child are at risk of death.

entities.name: her husband
entities.description: The spouse of the mother, mentioned as someone who might die.

entities.name: the son
entities.description: The child of the mother, mentioned as someone who might die.

relationships.description: Voldemort has power over Dumbledore, as he is able to make demands and threaten consequences.
Dumbledore dislikes Snape, as evident from his contemptuous tone.
Voldemort has the power to harm the mother's husband and child, as he is willing to let them die if his demands are not met.
Dumbledore has contempt for Snape, as evident from his tone and words.
